title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 75 - Returns, Payments And Records To Be Kept
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 75 - Returns, Payments And Records To Be Kept

State Regulations
§ 75.1 - Agent's cigarette tax returns
§ 75.2 - Wholesale dealer's informational returns and vending machine identification
§ 75.3 - Returns of cigarette use tax
§ 75.4 - Timely filing/timely payment
§ 75.5 - Records to be kept by agents and others

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 75

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
